website_summaries.verdict: Get a lot of pets for a good price with this set which also includes accessories.
pros: Features 15 different pets, including one glitter figure, 13 Deco Bits, and 2 accessories
A great way to add to your child's Littlest Pet Shop collection without spending a lot of money
cons: These are the tiny pets, not the full size, and packaging can be difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: Note these are the tiny version of the littlest pet ...
customer_reviews.text: Note these are the tiny version of the littlest pet shop toys. For the price you get quite a few animals, but they are not regular sized littlest pet shop animals. My kid loves them now but was surprised when they arrived (maybe even disappointed), so just be aware if you are looking for the littlest pet shop toys these are tiny versions of the small toys and definitely not for smaller kid.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: LPS Craze for 4th Grade Girls
customer_reviews.text: Nice range of LPSs. With the current craze of 4th grade girls collecting them, their emphasis tends to be on early-issued LPSs. Perhaps Hasbro could consider reissuing sets with "retired" ones. Another option would be issuing ones that are colorless and come with a paint set. The girls love painting over the characters. This set did give my granddaughter more to decorate and dress up with scraps of fabric, but the lack of older ones is the reason for 4 rather than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Cod Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Littlest Pet Shops!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has gone thru so many toys in her young life. There are certain toys that she clings to and ones that go out as fast as they come in. With Littlest Pet Shop toys it is the one toy that she can never have enough of. These are smaller than the originals, but she still loves them. The amount of imaginary play she does with these sets is enough to want more. Imagination and talk play has gone out the window these days and out kids just want screens. For my daughter she can sit in her room talking and playing with these friends for as many years as we can!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute but packaging sucks
customer_reviews.text: What a variety in this pack. My daughter couldn't wait to open this variety pack. She loved them all. The only thing about this is the packaging. They are so hard to get out it took me to basically cut all around the LPS to get them out. Each LPS comes with a little accessory and those things were super hard to get out of the packaging. It took quite some time to get everything out that is why I gave it 4 stars. The items are just as described and all of the stuff looks just like it does in the picture. My daughter is 8 and is obsessed with LPS.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: If your child likes LPS then these are a good addition!
customer_reviews.text: If your child like Littlest Pet Shop toys, then she will love these. Out of all the toys she owns, she seems to like her Littlest Pet Shop toys the most. She uses her imagination and plays scenes out with them.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Cute Affordable and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with Littlest Pet Shop. I was able to score these 15 Little Mini Pet Shops which are awesome for a great price. I am super happy with them and so was she on Christmas Morning. She loves making movies on her phone with them and using them in her doll house as the pets. Every little girl would love to play with these adorable little pets. They are worth the money you pay for them. I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Springer

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 year old daughter. She enjoys collecting Pet Shop toys and fell in love with these as soon as she saw them. My only gripe would be with the overall plastic packaging, it was difficult to get them all out. Other than that, everything arrived as described and she plays with them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Smart

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter asked and received..but if she was my daughter I would not have brought these little expensive big eyed things.. why do advertisers play on the children's innocence and the grandparents' pockets? She loved them as she asked I gave..I love being a grandparents
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. My granddaughter has these so I donated this to my church for underprivileged children at Christmas. I had to fight myself to keep it as it was so darn cute. I never showed this to her as she is age 6. Perfect gift. But a child will be very happy this Xmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they Look
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were gonna be the larger sized LPS but they are the smaller ones. Not the tiny smallest ones but the middle size ones.. My daughter loves these overpriced little pets and she will love it regardless. Still I bought these thinking they were the big ones. They are not.
customer_reviews.author: lynsey🤘

customer_reviews.title: LPS lovers dream.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been obsessed with LPS for about 6 of her 7 years. Every time I order this I get a different set, so it's nice for her not to have duplicates all the time. She even gets ones that we can't find at the local stores. There are ALOT of little LPS pets in here. I think they send you the most recent group every time you order. We've ordered 2 sets, a few months apart and they were different.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Sux
customer_reviews.text: Daughter lives it but it took over 2 months to arrive. Was suppose to be here before Christmas.. got in feb
customer_reviews.author: Dream⭐

customer_reviews.title: Worst packaging ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Toys are fine. They’re a little plastic things. But the packaging has got to be some of the WORST I’ve ever seen. It’s almost sadistic. Hasbro needs to seriously reconsider this. Would not buy again just because of the horrible packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable!! Definitely a good deal as well since you get 15 pets and 13 deco bits. All of the pets are super cute and most, it not all have moveable heads and places to put your deco bits. I purchased this along with the LPS pet partment so we had somewhere to store them all.
customer_reviews.author: ᴋᴀɪᴛʀᴏsᴇ

customer_reviews.title: They're the small ones
customer_reviews.text: The brown one we already had. The blue one came in this package. Just wanted all to know this package contains the small LPS animals. They're cute and my 5 yo loves them, but they are smaller.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: LPS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible packaging if you just want the toys out but absolutely fabulous if you want to keep a kid busy for hours trying to get them out. I still don’t understand why LPS cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves them, seems a bit spendy to me. The thing I really don't like is how difficult they are to remove from the packaging. She loves them though, once removed
customer_reviews.author: chris choppin

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it. Unboxing is hard
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter received this item from Santa Claus for Christmas. Only problem I had with this is unboxing it. It is incredibly difficult to get certain pieces out of the plastic !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bring.sarah.the.horizon

customer_reviews.title: Best Nana ever
customer_reviews.text: Went great with the pet partment that was bought as a Xmas present for my granddaughter. She loved them both. With them both being an Amazon exclusive the likelihood of duplication of it being Gifu was very unlikely which was a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: Anisa Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not standard size....smaller
customer_reviews.text: Not standard size lps figures smaller than standard size. Misleading advertising. Clearly says standard size bobble head type they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Parents be cautious
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world would a childrens toy need to be packaged so rediculously? Do not expect your child to be able to open this product. My child ended up getting cut trying to open this. I even got cut and I was trying to be cautious. I can see trying to secure a product but this is just plain stupid and a waste of money. Its no wonder why this toy is so expensive for no more than you get.
customer_reviews.author: eddie w phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for Amount of Product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as pictured. Good price for the amount of LPS’s in the box. Interior packaging is the absolute devil. Have patience and scissors at the ready, and a container to collect all the tiny accessories that come with it. Bought this alongside a LPS playhouse as a gift for a 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ashley b

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This product is misleading, they should have an actual size available, my kid is gonna be ticked when she gets these, they are so small, not like the OG ones!
customer_reviews.author: nanners

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful detail of the figures.
customer_reviews.text: Accessories that are attached to the figures do not stick well to pets, quickly break down. They are not reliable. PetShop itself has a beautiful appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Product as presented. They are a little smaller than I had thought they would be. Update: My granddaughter loved this packet--even though she received another one for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: SVWhe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone that likes LPS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loved it. I felt it was a little overpriced but in the end it made har happy.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Lovely offering in all sizes!
customer_reviews.text: LPS groupings are hard to find and seem expensive, but this matches & offers all sizes! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: kgoss

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. She loves LPS and is always playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable pets
customer_reviews.text: This was for my granddaughters birthday. Since her other gift was snow pants for winter snow days this was totally the gift that she was happy to receive.😂
customer_reviews.author: quiltbugs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids that like these little pet shop items.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know anything about this toy other than my 9 year old niece loved it. It was packaged well and was easy to wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller LPS but cute
customer_reviews.text: They were the smaller LPS but the child still loved them. Good price for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Genuine LPS, Great set of figures.
customer_reviews.text: Genuine LPS. I bought thise for my daughter's birthday and she's going to love them. They are NOT the full sized LPS. Pictures of the prodcut in the listing are accurate and to size. If you see the little girls playing with them you can tell what you are getting. This is a great price for 15 LPS figures especially because I ordered these for 14.99. Figures in the listing pictures are the ones you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 5 years old daughter's birthday and she absolutely love it. Those are so cute and great deal with price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reel

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: I used these to create a advent calendar. A few of the holes did not line up with the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Piretti

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it. As the parent, I wish we got more clarity on the contents
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter adores this set. My one gripe is that only one of the figures actually interacts with the app. This was not clear on the packaging (at least to me it wasn't). I probably would have just got a single "glitter" figure if I had known ahead of time that those are the only ones that you can use with the app. Overall though, cute and loved by the recipient, so 4 stars : )
customer_reviews.author: Robot Warrior

customer_reviews.title: All good. .bad box
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for grandkids ..box was in pretty bad shape this should be new !!!
customer_reviews.author: drum

customer_reviews.title: Little pet shop toys
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done but way too tiny...should be for kids 8+ Tiny toys mostly get lost...no value for money.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as picture those little suckers are hard to pop out of the plastic though so good luck
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves littlest pet shop but they are so hard to find anymore. She was thrilled to get these in the mail. Great value.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Animals are cute, but be aware that these are the "mini" versions, not the regular sized LPS figures.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun~at~Heart

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for a great price and was exactly as described

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loved it!!! It was her favorite of all the Christmas presents she received. I was very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: Cute and clean
customer_reviews.text: They came all cute and clean like the way I ordered them. I think the price is a bit much. But they have alot of pieces in it.
customer_reviews.author: NVMIts Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love the littlest pet shop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter or Christmas. Great product that my daughter loves and plays with

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than the ones I remember buying for my 13 year old when she was little. The accessories will get lost. They are microscopic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: What a gift 🎁
customer_reviews.text: This is the third grandchild I have bought Littlest pet shop for. How amazing it’s been around for over 13 years and each grandchild has asked for it. Your child will love this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My step daughter loved this collection. I didn't realize it had so many teeny accessories and almost threw some away. Cute collection with vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Moooooom

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this for young kids that could choke
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of pet shop characters in this set. I actually used them to decorate the top of my daughter's birthday cake. The character's are smaller, I would not recommend this for young kids that could choke. It did work perfectly for my older daughter. It is hard getting some of the pieces out of the plastic. Overall, it worked for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: mom5

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun addition to our pet shop collection
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun addition to our pet shop collection. My 7 year old loves these brightly colored pet shops, and has since given all her old pet shops to her little sister. Even though we have dozens of these things, both the girls fight over who gets to play with the Party Pack pet shops because of their bright colors. We might have to get another one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LPS
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER (7) IS OBSESSED WITH LPS AND THESE ARE SUPER CUTE! DEFINITELY WORTH THE BUY :)

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 7 year old and my niece loved it so purchased a second for her. They now play together with this set daily.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: My baby sister love it and still have the toys till this day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it and now my daughter wants some!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this!! They did the trick and she was super happy!

customer_reviews.title: Good qualiy, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren, they love them but for a single the$11 plus shipping my Goodnessll plz think of eldery...

customer_reviews.title: Great xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Unfamiliar w/ line. Did not realize (or check) that these are little (mini) LPS toys. Recipient loved & did not have any in this size. Easily transportable being so small & are used as LPS "babies" in play.
customer_reviews.author: Relentless Gardener

customer_reviews.title: The granddaughter loved this. I how ever didn't read exactly the ...
customer_reviews.text: The granddaughter loved this. I how ever didn't read exactly the size of the pet shops. In case you are like me...they are mini sized. Still a good purchase for any one who loves pet shops.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: LPS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is LPS obsessed. She enjoyed this. The packaging was rather difficult to get into, but totally worth seeing her smile.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super excited to give this to my step daughter she's going to love it. Sooooo cute!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: FYI These are not the bigger LPS dolls, they're the medium sized ones. They were just what my daughter wanted to be the little sisters and brothers of her other ones. She has teeny ones she uses as the babies as well. This was a great price for that many, and they arrived quickly all the way in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price, lots of fun for my 6 year old who wants to collect them all.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these! A set for a good price, this was the FIRST thing she opened of her many Christmas presents. We bought the limo to accompany the pets and she played with them for hours of fun and quiet play. Lots of little accessories to add to imaginative playing. We will buy more. A very cute product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great for an LPS collector
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with LPS! these are a new addition to her collection just in time for her birthday. She loved them but she wished they were the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Noelle

customer_reviews.title: She's still happy and so am I
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas present for my daughter last year. She's still happy and so am I. I still can't believe how these little things costs so much but I bet when I was growing up my parents thought the same thing. It's the little things in life that bring the biggest smiles
customer_reviews.author: BE Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in store now order for my 7year for xmas loved them

customer_reviews.title: The pets are brightly colored

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and bold colors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and kids love their unique qualities. Very colorful and fun toy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great price

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: Happy Niece
customer_reviews.text: It has cute accessories! My niece loved it! I got it for her birthday. Totally worth the price, I’ve searched different websites and all were too expensive. I also like that they have names in the back of the box for each character. That’s a nice touch!

customer_reviews.title: Great! Caution tiny parts
customer_reviews.text: Out little girl loved them! They are very cute. I will recommend that you be careful if you have toddlers or infants in the household because some of the pets have TINY accessories that can be put on and removed from the pets.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift

customer_reviews.title: Expected a different size of figurine
customer_reviews.text: These toys come in a couple of different sizes, and it was tough to tell which size these were. As a result, our kiddo ended up purchasing this set which was smaller than she expected.

customer_reviews.title: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Cute toys, very detailed and good quality. The packaging was ridiculous though - all of the pieces are encased in plastic and have to be individually cut out with scissors.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, lots of pets and hours of fun ...

I can say this gift was exactly what she was looking for and loves it very much. Great price, lots of pets and hours of fun for her and her friends!!

product_meta.title: Littlest Pet Shop Pet Party Spectacular Collector Pack Toy, Includes 15 Pets, Ages 4 and Up(Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: Littlest Pet Shop Pet Party Spectacular Collector Pack Toy includes 15 pets, themed Deco Bits pieces, and accessories so you can celebrate the biggest pet story of the year – Pet Fest! It's fun to make the pets look their best for the big bash – and the special sparkly kitty that’s included is sure to make a big, glittering entrance. A fantastic gift for kids ages 4 and up! Littlest Pet Shop and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: The Pet Party Spectacular Collector Pack Toy lets you celebrate the biggest story of the year – Pet Fest
They’re an incredible addition to any Littlest Pet Shop collection – especially the sparkly kitty pet
Customize the look of these pets over and over again
Kids ages 4 and up are sure to love this pack for birthdays, holidays, or any time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,327 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
